Access by appt. only.|5CBPF. 508 Directors of photography, Ted Ashton, Paul Babin ; editor, Cardon Walker. 511 0 Narrated by Buddy Ebsen. 520 Disney animator, Baxter Ward Kimbell, takes us on a tour of his home including his working railroad and fire station in his backyard and his various collections of toys, memorabilia and musical instruments in his home. He uses clips from Disney films to show how his interests have influenced his animation. 538 U-matic NTSC. 541 0 PFA 0750-01-10885.
